name: Develop Project Charter
desc: Authorizing the project and providing the PM with authority to use resources

name: Develop Project Mgmt. Plan
desc: Integrating subsidiary plans into a comprehensive project plan

name: Direct & Manage Project Work
desc: Performing project work and implementing approved changes

name: Manage Project Knowledge
desc: Creating and using knowledge to support the project and the organization

name: Monitor & Control Project Work
desc: Tracking and reporting project progress against the objectives

name: Perform Integrated Change Control
desc: Reviewing and approving change requests; communicating the decisions

name: Close Project or Phase
desc: Formally completing the phase or project

name: Plan Scope Management
desc: Documenting how scope will be defined and controlled

name: Collect Requirements
desc: Documenting stakeholder needs

name: Define Scope
desc: Developing a detailed project and product description

name: Create WBS
desc: Decomposing project work into smaller components

name: Validate Scope
desc: Formalizing acceptance of completed deliverables

name: Control Scope
desc: Monitoring project scope and managing changes to the scope baseline

name: Plan Schedule Management
desc: Documenting how the schedule will be developed and controlled

name: Define Activities
desc: Identifying the steps required to produce project deliverables

name: Sequence Activities
desc: Identifying relationships (or order) of project activities

name: Estimate Activity Durations
desc: Approximating the # of work periods needed to complete activities

name: Develop Schedule
desc: Analyzing activities sequences and estimates to create the schedule

name: Control Schedule
desc: Monitoring progress of activities and managing changes to the schedule baseline

name: Plan Cost Management
desc: Documenting how to estimate and control project costs

name: Estimate Costs
desc: Approximating the finances needed to complete project activities

name: Determine Budget
desc: Aggregating the costs of individual activities to generate the cost baseline

name: Control Costs
desc: Monitoring project costs and managing changes to the cost baseline

name: Plan Quality Management
desc: Identifying quality requirements and documenting how to comply with them

name: Manage Quality
desc: Converting the quality management plan into actionable quality activities

name: Control Quality
desc: Monitoring outcomes of quality activities to evaluate performance

name: Plan Resource Management
desc: Document responsibilities and create a staffing management plan

name: Estimate Activity Resources
desc: Estimating the manpower, materials, and equipment needed to complete the project

name: Acquire Resources
desc: Obtaining the manpower, materials, and equipment needed to complete the project

name: Develop Team
desc: Improving team skills and relations to enhance project performance

name: Manage Team
desc: Tracking team member performance, providing feedback, and resolving issues

name: Control Resources
desc: Monitoring planned versus actual resource usage

name: Plan Communications Management
desc: Developing a plan for communications based on the needs of stakeholders

name: Manage Communications
desc: Creating and distributing project information

name: Monitor Communications
desc: Monitoring communications to ensure stakeholder needs are met

name: Plan Risk Management
desc: Defining how to conduct risk management on the project

name: Identify Risks
desc: Detecting risks that may affect the project

name: Perform Qualitative Risk Analysis
desc: Prioritizing risks by evaluating their probability and impact

name: Perform Quantitative Risk Analysis
desc: Numerically analyzing the effect of risks on project objectives

name: Plan Risk Responses
desc: Defining strategies and actions to address project risks

name: Implement Risk Responses
desc: Putting risk response plans into effect

name: Monitor Risks
desc: Tracking existing risks and identifying/analyzing new risks

name: Plan Procurement Management
desc: Documenting the procurement method and identifying potential sellers

name: Conduct Procurements
desc: Collecting seller responses, choosing a seller, and awarding a contract

name: Control Procurements
desc: Managing procurement relationships and monitoring contract performance

name: Identify Stakeholders
desc: Determining who will be affected by the project and noting their involvement/impact

name: Plan Stakeholder Engagement
desc: Developing strategies to appropriately engage stakeholders during the project

name: Manage Stakeholder Engagement
desc: Communicating with stakeholders and addressing issues

name: Monitor Stakeholder Engagement
desc: Monitoring and adjusting plans for engaging stakeholders
